name: QatarGrow
description: QatarGrow is a meme token built on Binance smart chain that aims to merge cryptocurrency and football fans throughout the QATAR 2022 WORLDCUP. QatarGrow has many features that will help you to grow up your wallet portfolio with NFTs, sport betting, high yield staking. Qatar Grow will allow you to become a part of football community, find like-minded people, monetize your love for football, participate in various draws and win prizes, and most importantly increase your cryptocurrency. NFT'S & STAKING QatarGrow team managed to make unique nfts for each team in the world cup with the top 5 players in the team that will make you earn passive income by staking them. BUYBACK & BURN 1% $QatarGrow is collected from every transaction, converted to BNB & stored in our contract. When buyback is enabled, it purchases $QatarGrow and burn them permanently from the supply.
